ygData.subject: Re: Onyx in Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: yep..checked all of them. The only place I know where they carry really all the stones is Erudin. Skara ... From: Farr, Robert [mailto:robert.farr@trane.com]
ygData.messageBody:
yep..checked all of them. The only place I know where they carry really all
the stones is Erudin.
Skara

-----Original Message-----
From: Farr, Robert [mailto:robert.farr@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 2:02 PM
To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Onyx in Freeport


From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>

Have you checked in the Academy of Sciences for Onyx? I seem to remember
that one of the vendors carried quite a few different stones.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: DeGirolami, Franck [SMTP:degirolami@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 4:03 PM
> To: Eqenchanters (E-mail)
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Onyx in Freeport
>
> From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
>
> ok I've been working on my jewelry skill last night and I'm just done
> maxing
> it out with bloodstone ( skill 26 ). the next stone to work with from what
> I
> read is Onyx but I cant find it in Freeport. so maybe I should jump
> directly
> to the next one ( dont remember what it is ). I need advice here. if I
> jump
> to the next one, I'm afraid I'm gonna fail a lot and ruin my ( already
> tiny
> ) bank account. Is it worth the trip to another city ( like erudin ) to
> find
> onyx?
> Thanks.
> Skara.
>
